Class BlockAddedEvent

    public class BlockAddedEvent
extends java.lang.Object

    The event thrown when a block has been added to the domain.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlockAddedEvent

        public BlockAddedEvent​(java.lang.String addedBlockID,
                       java.lang.String linkedBlock,
                       ConnectionType linkedType,
                       BlockType type,
                       java.util.Set<java.lang.String> changedBlocks)
        Create the blockAddedEvent
        Parameters:
        addedBlockID - the ID of the block that has been added.
        linkedBlock - The ID of the block that's linked to the addedBlock after the add
        linkedType - The connection on which the added block is connected to the linkedBlock.
        type - The BlockType of the added Block
        changedBlocks - a set with the ID's of all blocks that were involved in this add.
